list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the theatrical technique of suggesting action, character, or emotion without words, using only gesture, expression, and movement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: mime is part of our cultural heritage
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: MIME là một phần của di sản văn hóa của chúng tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in ancient Greece and Rome) a simple farcical drama including mimicry.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Dorian mimes first began to lay the foundations of the theater
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dorian Mimes lần đầu tiên bắt đầu đặt nền móng của nhà hát

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a standard for formatting files of different types, such as text, graphics, or audio, so they can be sent over the internet and seen or played by a web browser or email application.
use gesture and movement without words in the acting of (a play or role).
